name: Reddit Context Bot
description: An event-based, reddit moderation bot built on top of snoowrap and written in typescript

CLIENT_ID.description: Client ID for your Reddit application

CLIENT_SECRET.description: Client Secret for your Reddit application

REFRESH_TOKEN.description: Refresh token retrieved from authenticating an account with your Reddit Application

ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Access token retrieved from authenticating an account with your Reddit Application

SUBREDDITS.description: If you do not want to run context bot on all subreddits it has moderator access to then specify a comma-deliminated list of subreddits to run on

WIKI_CONFIG.description: Relative url to contextbot wiki page EX https://reddit.com/r/subreddit/wiki/<path>
